scripts.publish:linux-arm64: npm run compile:linux-arm64 && vsce publish --target linux-arm64
scripts.publish:linux-x64: npm run compile:linux-x64 && vsce publish --target linux-x64
scripts.publish:darwin-arm64: npm run compile:darwin-arm64 && vsce publish --target darwin-arm64
scripts.publish:darwin-x64: npm run compile:darwin-x64 && vsce publish --target darwin-x64
scripts.package:linux-x64: npm run compile:linux-x64 && tsc -b && vsce package --target linux-x64
scripts.package:linux-arm64: npm run compile:linux-arm64 && tsc -b && vsce package --target linux-arm64
scripts.package:darwin-x64: npm run compile:darwin-x64 && tsc -b && vsce package --target darwin-x64
scripts.package:darwin-arm64: npm run compile:darwin-arm64 && tsc -b && vsce package --target darwin-arm64
scripts.compile:linux-x64: cross build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --release --manifest-path ../Cargo.toml && cp ../target/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/drupal_ls ./out/drupal_ls && node esbuild --production
scripts.compile:linux-arm64: cross build --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu --release --manifest-path ../Cargo.toml && cp ../target/aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/drupal_ls ./out/drupal_ls && node esbuild --production
scripts.compile:darwin-x64: cross build --target x86_64-apple-darwin --release --manifest-path ../Cargo.toml && cp ../target/x86_64-apple-darwin/release/drupal_ls ./out/drupal_ls && node esbuild --production
scripts.compile:darwin-arm64: cross build --target aarch64-apple-darwin --release --manifest-path ../Cargo.toml && cp ../target/aarch64-apple-darwin/release/drupal_ls ./out/drupal_ls && node esbuild --production
scripts.compile: cargo build --release --manifest-path ../Cargo.toml && cp ../target/release/drupal_ls ./dist/drupal_ls && npm run check-types && node esbuild.js
